profile.name: Alex Goodman
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Anchore
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong passion for Go programming language, container image security, and vulnerability scanning. Proven track record of contributing to multiple open-source projects simultaneously.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @anchore
description: Developed and maintained the anchore/syft project, ensuring seamless integration with container image security.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features for anchore/grype, enhancing vulnerability scanning capabilities.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to various open-source projects, including grype and goreleaser.
Demonstrated expertise in Go programming language, container image security, and vulnerability scanning.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained the bubbles project, ensuring timely releases and bug fixes.
Collaborated with community members to improve overall code quality and user experience.
